articles.title: Dow falls more than 200 points after Deutsche Bank slide raises more banking sector concerns: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: A plunge in shares of Deutsche Bank in Europe raised investor fears about the banking sector once again.
articles.content:
Stocks fell Friday as a drop in shares of Deutsche Bank in Europe raised investor fears about the banking sector once again.
